title: just transfered from na looking for duo partner
body:
Just transfered from plat 3 and it put me gold 5... looking for a plat+ to smash some pubs with :)

main support and jung

ign: flutter

replies.body: your rank resets when you move region??? How come you're gold 5?
its real pain in the but everyone RQs if you arent ahead at 10 mins. bit frustrating
You have to do placements again, with a soft reset. Much like the beginning of season.
add me i can try help you out
